LABEL: 0x31F
STRING: ――A plan.

LABEL: 0x337
STRING: That somewhat cliched word had an uncanny ring to it.

LABEL: 0x37B
STRING: We had to come up with a plan.

LABEL: 0x3AB
STRING: A plan on how to deal with <COOS>, that light.

LABEL: 0x3D7
STRING: For the sake of saving Tokiwa from our unknown enemy.

LABEL: 0x487
STRING: 「I know I'm being obstinate, but let me ask again.」

LABEL: 0x4C3
STRING: 「Please, be honest. If you've ever come into contact with that "light," raise your hand.」

LABEL: 0x53C
STRING: No one raised their hand.

LABEL: 0x61A
STRING: Touri was tilting her head in wonder... Right.

LABEL: 0x650
STRING: The only people who saw it were me, Yukari, and Reiri――

LABEL: 0x68E
STRING: Touri and Hiragino still didn't know about that light which made me shudder just remembering it.

LABEL: 0x725
STRING: 「No one's been in contact with it... Thank goodness.」

LABEL: 0x758
STRING: Yukari sighed in relief.

LABEL: 0x7E7
STRING: 「Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x814
STRING: 「Ah... Excuse me.」

LABEL: 0x897
STRING: 「Let's get right to the point. First, let's confirm the premise.」

LABEL: 0x8E0
STRING: Yukari continued.

LABEL: 0x902
STRING: ――However, the words she uttered were not ones I found acceptable.

LABEL: 0x977
STRING: 「In the future, if anyone is touched by that light――」

LABEL: 0x9B7
STRING: 「We'll have to abandon that person.」

LABEL: 0x9F4
STRING: We would abandon them merely because they had touched the "light?"

LABEL: 0xA20
STRING: Not bitten, not exposed to bodily fluids, just touched...

LABEL: 0xA6A
STRING: But then, what about her?

LABEL: 0xA9C
STRING: Yukari cast her eyes downward.

LABEL: 0xB24
STRING: 「It might sound too cruel.」

LABEL: 0xB58
STRING: 「But that's the one point I cannot concede. If you touch the light, that's it.」

LABEL: 0xC05
STRING: 「Moving on――」

LABEL: 0xC38
STRING: 「No, I can't accept that.」

LABEL: 0xC63
STRING: Hiragino's low voice interrupted her.

LABEL: 0xD56
STRING: 「From the way you're talking, we're not going to die just from touching it, right?」

LABEL: 0xDA2
STRING: 「I don't care how little hope there is for that person.」

LABEL: 0xDDA
STRING: 「I won't abandon someone if there's a chance to save them.」

LABEL: 0xE4A
STRING: Yukari hesitated at his straightforward words.

LABEL: 0xE76
STRING: She slowly opened her mouth, choosing her words carefully.

LABEL: 0xF1C
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, you would know why the plague spread, right?」

LABEL: 0xFD8
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x1001
STRING: 「The plague, or the Ebola disaster of 20 years ago...」

LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: 「The common cause for the outbreak were "characters without knowledge."」

LABEL: 0x10DD
STRING: Characters without knowledge...?

LABEL: 0x1128
STRING: 「People reached out to those who were sick.」

LABEL: 0x116C
STRING: 「They knew nothing, they could do nothing to help,

LABEL: 0x11AC
STRING: and only helped destroy themselves and society with their ignorance...」

LABEL: 0x125C
STRING: 「...What does that "light" have to do with that?」

LABEL: 0x12A9
STRING: 「It's the same thing with the "light."」

LABEL: 0x12D5
STRING: 「Once it touches you, there's no cure――」

LABEL: 0x130B
STRING: 「In the event of an infection, you must be quarantined to prevent further spreading.」

LABEL: 0x135B
STRING: 「That's the only thing we can do.」

LABEL: 0x139C
STRING: All we could do was prevent the infection from spreading.

LABEL: 0x13D6
STRING: We couldn't fight against it or destroy it. We could only try and keep the damage to a minimum.

LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: ――It was a declaration of defeat of sorts.

LABEL: 0x1469
STRING: 「I see what you're going for with this plague metaphor...」

LABEL: 0x14A7
STRING: 「However, things are different from back then.」

LABEL: 0x14D7
STRING: 「This ship may be limited in scale, but it's loaded with advanced medical equipment. There's even an MRI.」

LABEL: 0x15AA
STRING: 「What's your point?」

LABEL: 0x15D6
STRING: 「Even back then, there were medical experts working on it.」

LABEL: 0x1626
STRING: 「But, they came up short――」

LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: 「It's the same with us...」

LABEL: 0x16D7
STRING: 「Do you understand now?」

LABEL: 0x172F
STRING: Hiragino was unable to answer her and fell silent.

LABEL: 0x17A5
STRING: It was something beyond the reach of modern medicine.

LABEL: 0x17CD
STRING: An unknown, mysterious light that we had no way of dealing with.

LABEL: 0x1877
STRING: 「What matters is that as many people as possible survive.」

LABEL: 0x18BE
STRING: 「As many as possible...」

LABEL: 0x18F1
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x190F
STRING: 「As many as possible. And in order to do that, everyone has to share that as their ultimate goal.」

LABEL: 0x195F
STRING: 「For that goal, we have to make the right decisions and act accordingly.」

LABEL: 0x19FA
STRING: 「Let me repeat myself. If anyone touches that "light" even once, they will be abandoned.」

LABEL: 0x1A4E
STRING: 「Also, anyone touched by it should go into quarantine by themselves.」

LABEL: 0x1A90
STRING: 「That's the bare minimum rules we have to follow.」

LABEL: 0x1ACB
STRING: Her words... were reasonable, but... was it okay for me to accept them?

LABEL: 0x1B1D
STRING: It was as if she had already given up on all of us making it out alive――

LABEL: 0x1C22
STRING: 「What does that mean, Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x1C54
STRING: 「What about Tokiwa-chan? She was already touched by it, right?」

LABEL: 0x1C9E
STRING: 「How are we going to save her?」

LABEL: 0x1CD7
STRING: No one answered Touri's question.

LABEL: 0x1D07
STRING: She was swallowed by the light because I hadn't reached out to her.

LABEL: 0x1DB7
STRING: 「...I didn't want to say this, but...」

LABEL: 0x1DE1
STRING: 「Even if you see her body, please make sure not to touch her.」

LABEL: 0x1E9F
STRING: 「So... You're just going to abandon her!?」

LABEL: 0x1EF1
STRING: 「That's not what you said!」

LABEL: 0x1F24
STRING: 「I'm not abandoning her.」

LABEL: 0x1F50
STRING: 「It's just a plan to prevent further infection from spreading.」

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: 「We'll do the best we can within that context.」

LABEL: 0x1FC6
STRING: 「...But the chances of survival after being attacked by <COOS> are slim――」

LABEL: 0x209F
STRING: Touri was struck speechless.

LABEL: 0x20FD
STRING: She slowly turned around, asking for help.

LABEL: 0x214B
STRING: She could say nothing, and I had no words to offer to her.

LABEL: 0x21F5
STRING: 「Momoi, you should choose your words more carefully――」

LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: 「I am. Besides――」

LABEL: 0x22CB
STRING: 「...Besides, changing the words won't change the truth.」

LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: Yukari maintained her strong tone but lowered her eyes to her feet.

LABEL: 0x237B
STRING: 「We have to accept that.」

LABEL: 0x23B6
STRING: We had to accept it. The truth.

LABEL: 0x23E8
STRING: It was almost as if she was trying to convince herself.

LABEL: 0x2422
STRING: However, Touri didn't have the composure to be aware of Yukari's thoughts and feelings.

LABEL: 0x252D
STRING: 「...Liar.」

LABEL: 0x25B5
STRING: 「...I'm not lying.」

LABEL: 0x25EC
STRING: 「But, you said we'd save Tokiwa-chan――」

LABEL: 0x263B
STRING: 「I simply said I would do everything in my power to get us out of here.」

LABEL: 0x2682
STRING: To bring as many people as possible back alive.

LABEL: 0x26AC
STRING: What was needed for that was rational judgments and rational sacrifices.

LABEL: 0x26EA
STRING: 「For the best result we can reach right now...」

LABEL: 0x272D
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x274B
STRING: 「There's only so much we can do now.」

LABEL: 0x277D
STRING: 「We'll do the best we can with a proper understanding of our current situation.」

LABEL: 0x2818
STRING: 「If you can't promise me that, then I can't give you information about <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x2879
STRING: Her sharp tone, which was often meant for Hiragino or me, was now directed at Touri.

LABEL: 0x28C5
STRING: Even Touri should know that Yukari was right.

LABEL: 0x2905
STRING: But, she probably couldn't accept it.

LABEL: 0x2969
STRING: And most importantly... She hadn't seen that scene, that moment.

LABEL: 0x2A60
STRING: The overwhelming light.

LABEL: 0x2A7A
STRING: The girl standing there in her kimono.

LABEL: 0x2A98
STRING: As she was swallowed up by a vortex of light――

LABEL: 0x2B3F
STRING: 「...Geez.」

LABEL: 0x2B62
STRING: And so, she was the one who spoke up in the end.

LABEL: 0x2CAC
STRING: 「Aren't you all being too nice?」

LABEL: 0x2CE6
STRING: 「...You know we don't have time for this, right?」

LABEL: 0x2D24
STRING: 「Didn't she say so, too?」

LABEL: 0x2D50
STRING: 「"Characters without knowledge."」

LABEL: 0x2D7D
STRING: 「What we need right now is an accurate perception.」

LABEL: 0x2DBA
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x2DED
STRING: Reiri tapped on the wall with her fingers continuously as she talked.

LABEL: 0x2E29
STRING: The sound of it echoed inside the room like it was cornering us.

LABEL: 0x2E77
STRING: In a low and playful voice, she addressed us.

LABEL: 0x2F78
STRING: 「Let me rephrase it for Touri's sake.」

LABEL: 0x2FA6
STRING: 「Saihouji Tokiwa was attacked by a luminescent organism called <COOS> and died.」

LABEL: 0x307D
STRING: 「Hey――」

LABEL: 0x30A6
STRING: 「She may look alive, but she's already as good as dead.」

LABEL: 0x30E4
STRING: 「Even if she still lives, she won't survive.」

LABEL: 0x312A
STRING: 「Do you understand now, Nee-san?」

LABEL: 0x3161
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x31BA
STRING: Touri finally slumped her shoulders before Reiri, who showed no concern or restraint.

LABEL: 0x3208
STRING: ――She spoke of the things we couldn't.

LABEL: 0x324E
STRING: She turned away from Touri's downcast demeanor and cast her eyes down.

LABEL: 0x32A8
STRING: 「She's dead... Which means...」

LABEL: 0x32D8
STRING: 「...I guess it wasn't <Alice> after all.」

LABEL: 0x3317
STRING: <Alice>...

LABEL: 0x3333
STRING: Reiri muttered to herself.

LABEL: 0x3353
STRING: That word lingered in my ears.

LABEL: 0x3385
STRING: ――Tokiwa wasn't <Alice>?

LABEL: 0x33B3
STRING: What exactly was <Alice>?

LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: 「Now then... Let's continue.」

LABEL: 0x3478
STRING: 「The doctor has no objections, right?」

LABEL: 0x3510
STRING: 「...I don't.」

LABEL: 0x3587
STRING: 「However, as soon as we find her, I want to confirm whether she's alive or dead.」

LABEL: 0x35CE
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x35EC
STRING: Had he not lost hope for Tokiwa's survival yet?

LABEL: 0x3628
STRING: Reiri raised her eyebrows in amusement.

LABEL: 0x3661
STRING: 「I'm not doubting Reiri-kun or Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x3697
STRING: 「I'm just a man who doesn't believe something until I see it...」

LABEL: 0x36E1
STRING: 「I have no objections with quarantine as long as I know they're alive.」

LABEL: 0x378F
STRING: 「"Blessed is the man who does not see and yet believes."」

LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: 「...Well, whatever. It's not up to me to be the judge.」

LABEL: 0x389B
STRING: Yukari nodded her head in agreement with Reiri's words.

LABEL: 0x3937
STRING: 「Okay. As soon as we find Tokiwa-san, Hiragino-sensei will confirm whether she's alive or dead.」

LABEL: 0x398F
STRING: 「In that case, it's safe to assume that an agreement has been reached, correct?」

LABEL: 0x39D0
STRING: No one objected.

LABEL: 0x39FA
STRING: Yukari looked up again resolutely.

LABEL: 0x3A3B
STRING: 「Let's go over what we've just talked about.」

LABEL: 0x3A61
STRING: 「Our goal is to get as many people alive off this ship as possible.」

LABEL: 0x3AB5
STRING: 「In other words, destroying that creature within the ship――」

LABEL: 0x3B09
STRING: 「And to stop its contamination and find a path for us to escape.」

LABEL: 0x3BB0
STRING: 「...First, we must exterminate that creature.」

LABEL: 0x3BE5
STRING: A shared objective.

LABEL: 0x3C03
STRING: A plan to defeat that "light."

LABEL: 0x3C2D
STRING: 「Let me ask you something.」

LABEL: 0x3C57
STRING: 「That "light"... <COOS>, headed straight for Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x3CA1
STRING: 「It was like it had locked onto her and didn't even consider anyone else.」

LABEL: 0x3CF1
STRING: 「Is it really possible for deep-sea creatures to grasp the location of their prey so precisely just through sight?」

LABEL: 0x3D49
STRING: 「What senses does <COOS> use in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x3D99
STRING: The scene replayed over and over again in my mind.

LABEL: 0x3DCD
STRING: Those "lights" sensed her position immediately and attacked her.

LABEL: 0x3E19
STRING: They had attacked in a group like a disciplined army.

LABEL: 0x3EE3
STRING: 「I'll answer you... But first, let me correct you on one point.」

LABEL: 0x3F2F
STRING: 「Those creatures are not <COOS> themselves.」

LABEL: 0x3F7E
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x3FA3
STRING: 「The creatures that swarmed and attacked Tokiwa-san earlier were "infected" with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x4004
STRING: 「...Are you saying that <COOS> is a pathogen?」

LABEL: 0x40A6
STRING: 「No... Their movement is certainly governed by something akin to the behavioral principles of <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x4108
STRING: 「But, they've basically been hijacked... Or maybe brainwashed... Umm...」

LABEL: 0x41AF
STRING: 「Sorry. Let me gather my thoughts.」

LABEL: 0x41EE
STRING: She then began to ponder something.

LABEL: 0x421E
STRING: It infected you, took over your mind, and controlled your behavior...?

LABEL: 0x4258
STRING: It was like a myth I had heard a long time ago about a parasite living in the Amazon.

LABEL: 0x4310
STRING: 「I don't know if I can convey it correctly, but...」

LABEL: 0x4348
STRING: 「The simplest way to put it would be to say that they're a collective life form.」

LABEL: 0x43A3
STRING: 「...Is it different from creatures that just flock together?」

LABEL: 0x4453
STRING: 「It's completely different, so let me explain.」

LABEL: 0x4480
STRING: Yukari raised a finger and switched to lecture mode for the first time in a while.

LABEL: 0x4534
STRING: 「A collective lifeform―individually, there are no rules to their behavior or movement...」

LABEL: 0x458E
STRING: 「But, when they come together as a collective, they move as if they have some kind of "intention."」

LABEL: 0x45E8
STRING: 「Individually, they're insignificant, but...」

LABEL: 0x4636
STRING: 「As the hosts for <COOS>, they become a threat once they come together.」

LABEL: 0x4687
STRING: 「...What does that mean in a nutshell?」

LABEL: 0x472B
STRING: 「...<COOS> uses existing organisms as its "vehicles."」

LABEL: 0x477A
STRING: So the luminescent creatures from before were being used as a vehicle by <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x47C4
STRING: 「The real threat is <COOS>, not the organism serving as its vehicle...」

LABEL: 0x4880
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x48A3
STRING: 「All right... I'll keep that in mind.」

LABEL: 0x48CF
STRING: 「Then how do the creatures possessed by <COOS> behave?」

LABEL: 0x491F
STRING: 「Why and how exactly do they attack a living person?」

LABEL: 0x4965
STRING: I asked again.

LABEL: 0x499B
STRING: Yukari spun around and looked back to Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4A92
STRING: 「Wouldn't Reiri-san be better suited to answer that than me?」

LABEL: 0x4ADB
STRING: 「Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x4B06
STRING: 「I may be an employee of ROMLES, but there's a limit to how much information I can give to you.」

LABEL: 0x4B6A
STRING: 「She might know something that even I don't.」

LABEL: 0x4C14
STRING: 「You're overestimating me.」

LABEL: 0x4C3B
STRING: She didn't seem to care about Yukari's sarcastic tone.

LABEL: 0x4C73
STRING: ...On the contrary, Reiri answered in a hoarse voice without even looking at her.

LABEL: 0x4D33
STRING: 「This <COOS> you're talking about communicates with only one physical quantity.」

LABEL: 0x4D87
STRING: 「Electromagnetic force.」

LABEL: 0x4DC4
STRING: 「Light and magnetism are its two phenotypes.」

LABEL: 0x4DF8
STRING: 「That's all they can detect... They're quite simple, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x4EA1
STRING: 「It's hilarious that ROMLES is being pushed around by such a simple creature.」

LABEL: 0x4F02
STRING: <COOS> only communicated through electromagnetism――

LABEL: 0x4F3A
STRING: Yukari nodded slowly as if comparing what Reiri had said to the knowledge she possessed.

LABEL: 0x5059
STRING: 「――We should be able to trust what she told us.」

LABEL: 0x509D
STRING: 「It's known that organisms infected with <COOS> are attracted to light.」

LABEL: 0x50F1
STRING: 「That should allow us to manipulate their movements to some degree.」

LABEL: 0x514A
STRING: 「So, if we first generate light near <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x5188
STRING: then manipulate it to make them gather in a single location...」

LABEL: 0x51C2
STRING: 「We might be able to herd all of <COOS> to somewhere we want...」

LABEL: 0x524C
STRING: Yukari nodded vaguely in agreement to my strategy.

LABEL: 0x5286
STRING: However, we couldn't be sure that it would work yet.

LABEL: 0x531C
STRING: 「But that's only in theory... Whether it actually succeeds or not is a different matter.」

LABEL: 0x5370
STRING: 「And even though it's drawn to light, the effective frequencies are limited.」

LABEL: 0x53BE
STRING: 「We can't just use any light. We have to recreate the kind of light they emit.」

LABEL: 0x541C
STRING: 「So... it's not as simple as it sounds.」

LABEL: 0x545F
STRING: Yukari was right.

LABEL: 0x547F
STRING: It sounded simple, but...

LABEL: 0x54A7
STRING: The light they reacted to was the same kind they emitted.

LABEL: 0x54DD
STRING: It wouldn't be easy to reproduce it.

LABEL: 0x55E2
STRING: 「Use light to lure the light...」

LABEL: 0x560E
STRING: 「This wouldn't work, would it?」

LABEL: 0x563F
STRING: Touri grabbed a flashlight that was provided in the room.

LABEL: 0x567B
STRING: It was what we'd always relied on as a light source.

LABEL: 0x56C4
STRING: 「That's certainly a light source.」

LABEL: 0x56F2
STRING: 「I'm sure they'll recognize it as a target, but...」

LABEL: 0x5731
STRING: It was true that even a flashlight was a "light."

LABEL: 0x5767
STRING: However, I didn't have the knowledge to make a judgment on whether it was suited for our plan.

LABEL: 0x5810
STRING: Yukari was about to say something again but stopped herself.

LABEL: 0x5878
STRING: Unable to deny Touri's suggestion clearly, we naturally turned our attention to her.

LABEL: 0x592E
STRING: 「...Unfortunately, you can't lure <COOS> with that flashlight.」

LABEL: 0x5984
STRING: 「The spectrum of light which it responds to best doesn't exist in nature.」

LABEL: 0x59DE
STRING: 「It's the light <COOS> itself emits, which hasn't been even experimentally reproduced so far...」

LABEL: 0x5A2B
STRING: 「So we can't produce it? Then, this whole plan is――」

LABEL: 0x5A80
STRING: 「Don't jump to conclusions.」

LABEL: 0x5AA3
STRING: Reiri reprimanded me while still tapping the wall steadily with her fingers.

LABEL: 0x5B45
STRING: 「There are two things that <COOS> reacts to in the light.」

LABEL: 0x5B85
STRING: 「One is the amount of light.」

LABEL: 0x5BA3
STRING: 「It only reacts to strong light sources. And――」

LABEL: 0x5BE5
STRING: 「The other is the light pattern.」

LABEL: 0x5C22
STRING: Light pattern...

LABEL: 0x5C51
STRING: 「The light pattern that <COOS> emits is unique.」

LABEL: 0x5C87
STRING: 「The light it emits as a whole might seem irregular and random.」

LABEL: 0x5CDD
STRING: 「But, if you analyze it carefully...」

LABEL: 0x5D1D
STRING: 「What you'll eventually see is a unique pattern that cannot be reduced to a simple rhythm...」

LABEL: 0x5DD2
STRING: 「That's the key.」

LABEL: 0x5DF3
STRING: She sounded like a famous detective from classical literature. There was no hesitation in her tone.

LABEL: 0x5E53
STRING: And just like that, she turned to leave.

LABEL: 0x5E85
STRING: 「Where are you going?」

LABEL: 0x5EB6
STRING: 「To the library.」

LABEL: 0x5ED7
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x5EFC
STRING: 「If you take me to the library, I'll figure something out.」

LABEL: 0x5F47
STRING: Her words were forceful.

LABEL: 0x5F65
STRING: Despite her frail voice and small back, Reiri's voice had magical persuasiveness to it.

LABEL: 0x608A
STRING: 「Wh-What do you mean by "something?"」

LABEL: 0x6126
STRING: 「It's simple, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x6151
STRING: She waved her hand in the air as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x6194
STRING: 「I have the data of <COOS's> light pattern analysis.」

LABEL: 0x6287
STRING: 「That's what ROMLES does, right?」

LABEL: 0x62B5
STRING: 「There's no reason I can't do it.」

LABEL: 0x631C
STRING: Reiri took one look at the surprised Yukari and answered boldly.

LABEL: 0x634A
STRING: She talked as if she was an equal to a whole national institution.

LABEL: 0x6402
STRING: 「There are many PDAs in the library, right?」

LABEL: 0x643B
STRING: 「We'll program the PDAs to flash with the same pattern using the data I have as a reference.」

LABEL: 0x64A4
STRING: 「We should be able to use a bunch of them to lure <COOS> that way.」

LABEL: 0x655E
STRING: 「What do you think, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x6585
STRING: 「――What, me?」

LABEL: 0x65A5
STRING: I faltered at her sudden question.

LABEL: 0x662A
STRING: The corners of her mouth curled up into a mean grin.

LABEL: 0x6677
STRING: 「Isn't that obvious? This operation depends on your programming skills.」

LABEL: 0x66CE
STRING: 「Seriously...?」

LABEL: 0x66EA
STRING: ...So, it was my role to program the PDAs?

LABEL: 0x671E
STRING: Reiri examined my face as if testing me.

LABEL: 0x6813
STRING: 「That's absurd...」

LABEL: 0x6833
STRING: 「I don't know how skilled you are, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x6875
STRING: 「But, if it's the first time you've seen a PDA, so there's no way you could do something like that right off the bat――」

LABEL: 0x68DF
STRING: 「Shut it, granny.」

LABEL: 0x69F5
STRING: 「I'm asking him.」

LABEL: 0x6A1D
STRING: 「So, let's hear it... We don't have much time.」

LABEL: 0x6A8A
STRING: ...It would be the first time I'd taken a look at the PDAs.

LABEL: 0x6AAB
STRING: I didn't even know what their internal structure was like.

LABEL: 0x6AEB
STRING: This was a stand-alone environment cut off from the surface network.

LABEL: 0x6B2F
STRING: I could list any number of reasons why it would be impossible.

LABEL: 0x6B5F
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x6B91
STRING: 「Thirty minutes... No, fifteen minutes will be enough.」

LABEL: 0x6BCE
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x6BF1
STRING: Reiri's face twisted beside the surprised Yukari.

LABEL: 0x6C29
STRING: That must be her way of smiling.

LABEL: 0x6CC3
STRING: 「You're on our side after all.」

LABEL: 0x702C
STRING: Programming light emission patterns into all the PDAs in the library,

LABEL: 0x706F
STRING: and using them as decoys to lure the "light."

LABEL: 0x709D
STRING: It was a simple strategy when you put it like that.

LABEL: 0x70C5
STRING: But wasn't it... a little too simple?

LABEL: 0x71BE
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x71E4
STRING: 「T-Touri... What is it?」

LABEL: 0x7276
STRING: 「You look awfully scared. What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x72B5
STRING: 「It's nothing...」

LABEL: 0x72CF
STRING: ...Was I overthinking it?

LABEL: 0x72F3
STRING: I had a hard time believing that <COOS>, which Yukari had labeled as extremely dangerous,

LABEL: 0x7329
STRING: would be that easy to deal with...

LABEL: 0x742C
STRING: 「I know what you're thinking.」

LABEL: 0x745C
STRING: 「It's a bit anticlimactic... But, our opponent is a microscopic bacterium.」

LABEL: 0x749C
STRING: 「I can't say I don't agree with you...」

LABEL: 0x74D1
STRING: Hiragino staggered a bit as he said it. He was a little pale.

LABEL: 0x750F
STRING: He hadn't been feeling well for a while, but compared to earlier, he seemed even worse now...

LABEL: 0x75A7
STRING: Reiri gave me a very tired look as I worried about Hiragino's condition.

LABEL: 0x76CA
STRING: 「Don't tell me, you guys――」

LABEL: 0x76EE
STRING: 「Do you really think all we have to do is control the light, and that's it?」

LABEL: 0x77A2
STRING: 「Huh? Is that not it?」

LABEL: 0x77C5
STRING: As Touri said the first thing that popped into her head,

LABEL: 0x77EF
STRING: Reiri shook her head in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x788F
STRING: 「You really are an idiot, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x78B7
STRING: 「...But, it seems like these two are just as foolish as you.」

LABEL: 0x7938
STRING: She raised two fingers and pointed them at us.

LABEL: 0x7976
STRING: Naturally, it wasn't a peace sign or anything like that.

LABEL: 0x7A14
STRING: 「Have you forgotten? The second trait of electromagnetism?」

LABEL: 0x7A4F
STRING: 「...Magnetism.」

LABEL: 0x7A78
STRING: 「Exactly. <COOS> also has magnetosomes.」

LABEL: 0x7ABF
STRING: Magnetosomes...?

LABEL: 0x7AE1
STRING: Sensing my confusion, Reiri called out to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7BE4
STRING: 「That's your specialty, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x7C76
STRING: 「...You're well-informed.」

LABEL: 0x7C9D
STRING: Yukari answered honestly, no longer surprised.

LABEL: 0x7D98
STRING: 「<COOS> is a type of magnetic bacteria.」

LABEL: 0x7DC6
STRING: 「Magnetic bacteria possess an organ called magnetosome.」

LABEL: 0x7E0E
STRING: 「It senses electromagnetic signals and uses them to find the best growing environment for itself...」

LABEL: 0x7E68
STRING: 「You could say that <COOS> is able to accurately track and invade living beings because it has magnetosomes.」

LABEL: 0x7F0B
STRING: It locates living things by detecting electrical signals and uses light to attract its companions...

LABEL: 0x7F63
STRING: Wasn't it terribly efficient for how little information it exchanged...?

LABEL: 0x8023
STRING: 「It senses electrical signals...」

LABEL: 0x804F
STRING: 「Doesn't that mean we're in a pretty bad situation right now?」

LABEL: 0x8098
STRING: 「Touri?」

LABEL: 0x80BF
STRING: 「If the floor is flooded like this, that means it's that much easier for electricity to pass through, right?」

LABEL: 0x811A
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x8132
STRING: No wonder they attacked Tokiwa with such precision.

LABEL: 0x8186
STRING: Would we really be able to defeat an opponent like that?

LABEL: 0x81D4
STRING: Meanwhile, Reiri grinned.

LABEL: 0x82CD
STRING: 「Now, now. I'm sure you've had enough scares by now.」

LABEL: 0x8309
STRING: 「Either way, there's nothing we can do but follow the plan we have. Isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0x836E
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x8394
STRING: That said, it would be bad if we got attacked on the way to the library.

LABEL: 0x8412
STRING: Just until then, if there was some way to keep electricity from flowing――

LABEL: 0x84C4
STRING: 「Oh, in that case, I have rubber shoes.」

LABEL: 0x84F5
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x8520
STRING: 「See?」

LABEL: 0x853B
STRING: Saying that, Yukari pointed at her feet.

LABEL: 0x85D5
STRING: 「These are boots meant for the attendants. They're made of rubber, but they don't get stuffy.」

LABEL: 0x862D
STRING: 「So, you can wear them without much concern.」

LABEL: 0x8670
STRING: 「That would be great!」

LABEL: 0x869F
STRING: 「One moment, please.」

LABEL: 0x86DC
STRING: Yukari sat down on a chair and yanked her boots off.

LABEL: 0x872E
STRING: I accepted the boots she gave to me and inserted my toes in them.

LABEL: 0x8786
STRING: I tried putting them on again.

LABEL: 0x87B4
STRING: ...Hmm?

LABEL: 0x87CC
STRING: Once again, and once more.

LABEL: 0x87F4
STRING: I tried stepping into the boots over and over, but...

LABEL: 0x8851
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x8872
STRING: She sounded dubious.

LABEL: 0x8892
STRING: Cold sweat ran down my forehead.

LABEL: 0x88B4
STRING: I held the boot with both of my hands and pushed my foot in――

LABEL: 0x890D
STRING: 「They don't fit, do they?」

LABEL: 0x893A
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x8956
STRING: The boots were too small for me, as it turned out.

LABEL: 0x8982
STRING: Of course they were.

LABEL: 0x8998
STRING: It'd be weird if Yukari had the same shoe size as me.

LABEL: 0x89E0
STRING: Even though they were just the wrong size, the boots were now rendered completely useless.

LABEL: 0x8AA5
STRING: 「...Nothing we can do about that.」

LABEL: 0x8B47
STRING: 「Oh well... Then what are we going to do?」

LABEL: 0x8B8C
STRING: 「I'll run. With all my might.」

LABEL: 0x8BAA
STRING: 「It's the only way, right?」

LABEL: 0x8BD0
STRING: People, this was what running out of options looked like.

LABEL: 0x8C62
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x8C83
STRING: Yukari was about to say something, but Hiragino held out his arm to stop her.

LABEL: 0x8D30
STRING: 「If I see that light again, I'll run to a nearby room.」

LABEL: 0x8D76
STRING: 「So, don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x8E22
STRING: 「All right. But...」

LABEL: 0x8E4C
STRING: 「...I feel like someone's had a bad influence on you these couple of days.」

LABEL: 0x8EBC
STRING: Hiragino stood there awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x8EE2
STRING: Pretending not to notice, I headed for the hallway.

LABEL: 0x8F14
STRING: It was the correct choice to refer to how he usually handled Yukari. This time at least.

LABEL: 0x8FDF
STRING: 「Reiri, hand me the data.」

LABEL: 0x9075
STRING: 「I'm coming with you, too.」

LABEL: 0x909C
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x90C1
STRING: 「I won't give you the data otherwise.」

LABEL: 0x90F2
STRING: What was she saying at this stage...?

LABEL: 0x912E
STRING: If I took her with me, the risk of being attacked by <COOS> would be much higher.

LABEL: 0x918C
STRING: Touri also spoke up out of concern for her sister.

LABEL: 0x91C1
STRING: 「Reiri, let's leave it to him!」

LABEL: 0x91FE
STRING: 「Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x9214
STRING: 「Just take me to the library.」

LABEL: 0x926F
STRING: Without her data, this strategy wouldn't work.

LABEL: 0x92A5
STRING: Even if I tried to snatch it away by force, I had no idea how to use it...

LABEL: 0x92F1
STRING: Certainly, taking her with me would put us in great danger, but...

LABEL: 0x9331
STRING: ...I didn't have time to persuade her.

LABEL: 0x9375
STRING: I took Reiri's hand again and dashed off.

LABEL: 0x93A9
STRING: We headed for the library on the third floor.
